short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically converts goo.gl to ggoo.gl links on all websites. Keep your short links active after Google's shutdown!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep your goo.gl links alive effortlessly! This extension automatically converts goo.gl links to ggoo.gl across all websites, ensuring your short links stay active after Google's shutdown on August 25, 2025.

Key Features:
- Automatic Detection: Identifies goo.gl links in web content and link texts.
- Instant Conversion: Transforms goo.gl to ggoo.gl with just an extra 'g'.
- Seamless Integration: Works on all websites, including complex platforms like Facebook and YouTube.
- No New Links Needed: Preserves your existing short links – no need to create new ones.

Simply install and forget – let ggoo.gl handle the rest. It's the easiest solution to keep your goo.gl short links functional. Don't let your valuable links expire; revive them with ggoo.gl today!
